H0.text: What is the alcoholic ingredient of Irish coffee. Rum

H1.text: What is the alcoholic ingredient of Irish coffee. Brandy

H2.text: What is the alcoholic ingredient of Irish coffee. Triple Sec

H3.text: What is the alcoholic ingredient of Irish coffee. Wiskey

A4.text: Irish coffee (Irish: caife Gaelach) is a caffeinated alcoholic drink consisting of Irish whiskey, hot coffee and sugar, which has been stirred and topped with cream (sometimes cream liqueur).
